Sentencas: A detailed computational model of a direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) is presented.
Titulo: Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner

Sentencas: The DFFC is based on a fuel-rich methane-air flame stabilized on a flat-flame burner and coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner

Sentencas: The model consists of an elementary kinetic description of the premixed methane-air flame, a stagnation-point flow description of the coupled heat and mass transport within the gas phase, an elementary kinetic description of the electrochemistry, as well as heat, mass and charge transport within the SOFC.
Titulo: Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner

Sentencas: Simulated current-voltage characteristics show excellent agreement with experimental data published earlier (Kronemayer et al., 2007
Titulo: Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner
Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner

Sentencas: The model-based analysis of loss processes reveals that ohmic resistance in the current collection wires dominates polarization losses, while electronic loss currents in the mixed conducting electrolyte have only little influence on the polarized cell.
Titulo: Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner

Sentencas: The model was used to propose an optimized cell design.
Titulo: Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner

Sentencas: Based on this analysis, power densities of above 200 mW cm(-2) can be expected.
Titulo: Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner
Modeling, simulation and optimization of a no-chamber solid oxide fuel cell operated with a flat-flame burner
